H

Hand - Class in player
The Hand classes takes care of the operation specific to each hand of Blackjack.
Hand() - Constructor for class player.Hand
Constructs an empty hand with a total of 0
hasBust() - Method in class player.Player
Sets the player's bust status to true
hasDoubleDowned() - Method in class player.Gambler
Returns whether the Gambler has double downed or not
hasMoney() - Method in class player.Gambler
Returns whether the Gambler has any money left
hasPlayerBust() - Method in class player.Player
Returns whether the Player's Hand is greater than 21
hasSoft17() - Method in class player.Hand
Determines whether the dealer currently has a soft 17 (Ace and 6)
helpers - package helpers
 
hit(Card) - Method in class player.Player
Allows a player to receive a new card from the deck
